items.raw_text:
Welcome and Introductions
Councilmember Katy Yaroslavsky, Chair of the Budget and Finance Committee, will welcome members and lead introductions.
items.title: Welcome and Introductions

items.raw_text:
VOTE: BFAC Chair and Vice-Chair
The Committee will nominate and vote to elect a Chair and Vice-Chair for the BFAC.
items.title: VOTE: BFAC Chair and Vice-Chair

items.raw_text:
Budget Overview
Staff will provide an overview of the City budget and key financial priorities.
items.title: Staff will provide an overview of the City budget and key financial priorities.

items.raw_text:
Discussion: Committee Focus Areas
The Committee will discuss a work plan, set goals and focus areas for the year, and consider focus area leadership, as needed.
items.title: Discussion: Committee Focus Areas

items.raw_text:
Next Steps
Identify next steps, meeting frequency, and confirm upcoming BFAC meeting dates.
items.title: Identify next steps, meeting frequency, and confirm upcoming BFAC meeting dates.
